org.epics.pvData.property
Interface PVAlarm

All Known Implementing Classes:
PVAlarmFactory
public interface PVAlarm

PVAlarm. Attach to a PVData alarm structure. Note that an alarm structure has the following structure: 

    structure alarm
        int severity
        int status
        string message
This interface converts betweeen the integer severity and the enum alarmSeverity.

Author:
mrk

Method Detail

attach

boolean attach(PVField pvField)
Attempt to attach to the alarm field. The field must either be an alarm field itself or a subfield of the parent of a field named value.

Parameters:
pvField - The field for which to find an alarm field,
Returns:
(false,true) if alarm field (not found, found).

detach

void detach()
Remove attachment to alarm field.

isAttached

boolean isAttached()
Is this attached to an alarm structure.

Returns:
(false,true) is (not, is) attached to an alarm structure.

get

void get(Alarm alarm)
Get the alarm. A logic error exception will be thrown if not attached to an alarm field.

set

boolean set(Alarm alarm)
Set the alarm.

Parameters:
alarm - The new value.
Returns:
(false,true) if the alarm field is (immutable,updated).
